title: Illaoi taunt
body:
So I've noticed something about Illaoi's taunt that I think needs remedied. It's very quiet!

I compared it to Vayne's since we were next to each other and we each taunted.

I found Vayne's nice and clear, but Illaoi's was pretty hard to make out.

Maybe take a look at this Riot? Please?   {{champion:420}}
